channel.title: Need urgent help
channel.description:
I try connecting to my friends [317] server. When I load the client, the cmd promt shows this; [code]connecting to update server java.lang.NullPointerException at Gui.midiPlayer(Gui.java:209) at Gui.initUI(Gui.java:141) at Gui.<init>(Gui.java:60) at Gui.main(Gui.java:48) connected to update server[/code]
And when I try to connect it always says no response?

item.title: Need urgent help
item.dc:creator: @Tension_Ltd Tension Ltd
item.description:
@Tension_Ltd wrote:

Maybe try to edit the run and type in the right jdk or java. and then it might work

Read full topic

item.title: Need urgent help
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

It is online, because he, and a few others are connected. And so far I’m the only one with the error, and it doesn’t matter what client I use.

Read full topic

item.title: Need urgent help
item.dc:creator: @Tension_Ltd Tension Ltd
item.description:
@Tension_Ltd wrote:

It can mean that your friends server is not online because some client’s won’t load if the server is not up.

  • Tension Ltd

Read full topic
